rev.comment: future events should always be treated as uncertain
rev.diff:
Line 41: Line 41:
=== Versions ===
=== Versions ===
â
Version 1.0, "deltad", was released on 2 November 2006 and was based on Ubuntu 6.06 "Dapper Drake". Version 2.0, "deltah", followed on 30 April 2008 and is based on Ubuntu 8.04 "Hardy Heron"; version 2.1 is a minor update which removes non-free software and expands hardware support. Version 3.0 will be based on [[Debian]] instead of Ubuntu.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.gnewsense.org/index.php?n=FAQ.FAQ#toc13 |title=FAQ - gNewSense GNU/Linux |publisher=Gnewsense.org |date=2011-06-01 |accessdate=2011-07-02}}</ref>
+
Version 1.0, "deltad", was released on 2 November 2006 and was based on Ubuntu 6.06 "Dapper Drake". Version 2.0, "deltah", followed on 30 April 2008 and is based on Ubuntu 8.04 "Hardy Heron"; version 2.1 is a minor update which removes non-free software and expands hardware support. Version 3.0 is expected to be based on [[Debian]] instead of Ubuntu.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.gnewsense.org/index.php?n=FAQ.FAQ#toc13 |title=FAQ - gNewSense GNU/Linux |publisher=Gnewsense.org |date=2011-06-01 |accessdate=2011-07-02}}</ref>
